thread.title: Comfort Inn Brooklyn, a Brooklyn Hotel, Announces Special Offers to Guests Who Come for Events at Barclays Center and Other Top Venues
thread.title_full: Comfort Inn Brooklyn, a Brooklyn Hotel, Announces Special Offers to Welcome Guests Who Come for Events at Barclays Center and Other Top Venues

author: Michael Hibdon
title: Comfort Inn Brooklyn, a Brooklyn Hotel, Announces Special Offers to Guests Who Come for Events at Barclays Center and Other Top Venues
text:
Brooklyn Hotels like Comfort Inn Brooklyn Downtown are preparing to welcome the many visitors who will come to attend fall events or just to enjoy autumn in the City. Comfort Inn Brooklyn’s ideal location is within walking distance of Barclays Center, so this Hotel is a perfect choice when visiting the City to attend events at that popular venue. Comfort Inn Brooklyn offers to welcome fall guests. View details > In addition to the chance to view the incredible nearby fall foliage and enjoy other popular fall activities, the events that take place in October and November draw many visitors to Brooklyn Hotels. Since the Barclays Center is just a short walk from Comfort Inn Brooklyn, that hotel is a top choice for guests attending events at the venue.
Some of the upcoming events at Barclays Center are:
 Legend of Zelda: Symphony of The Goddesses The Ultimate Craft Beer Festival Barclays Center Classic – Brooklyn Hoops Joseph Prince: Grace Revolution USA Tour Disney on Ice: 100 Years of Magic
In addition to these and other special events, the Barclays Center is also home to the Brooklyn Nets basketball team and the New York Islanders hockey team. Comfort Inn Brooklyn offers reasonably-priced guest rooms and the location is ideal for those attending events at Barclays Center.
Those planning a visit can Check Rates and Make Reservations online or call 718.855.9600.
About Comfort Inn Brooklyn – Downtown – A Brooklyn Hotel:
Comfort Inn Brooklyn – Downtown is a conveniently-located Brooklyn Hotel. Positioned in the heart of the Brooklyn Restaurant District, this Brooklyn Hotel is also within walking distance of Barclays Center and near other top Brooklyn Attractions including the Brooklyn Bridge, Brooklyn Navy Yard, and Brooklyn’s Prospect Park.
Guests who choose Comfort Inn Brooklyn – Downtown will also be just a short train ride from all the best Manhattan Dining, Shopping, and Attractions such as Times Square, the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, and much more.
The guest rooms at this Downtown Brooklyn hotel feature thoughtful amenities including free high-speed wireless internet, LCD TVs, guest laundry services, and free newspaper delivery. Guests will also enjoy a free hot breakfast during each morning of their stay.
Those planning a visit can Check Rates, Make Reservations or call 718.855.9600.
Visitors can also browse the Hotel’s Brooklyn’s Visitors Guide for information about Activities, Attractions, Shopping, and Dining options located near this Brooklyn Hotel.
